ps3.2:1.3: Iddhiyā kati bhūmiyo, kati pādā, kati padāni, kati mūlāni?
ps3.2:1.9: Iddhiyā catasso bhūmiyo, cattāro pādā, aṭṭha padāni, soḷasa mūlāni.
ps3.2:2.2: Adhiṭṭhānā iddhi, vikubbanā iddhi, manomayā iddhi, ñāṇavipphārā iddhi, samādhivipphārā iddhi, ariyā iddhi, kammavipākajā iddhi, puññavato iddhi, vijjāmayā iddhi, tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi.
ps3.2:3.2: Vivekajābhūmi paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ, pītisukhabhūmi dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ, upekkhāsukhabhūmi tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ, adukkhamasukhābhūmi catutthaṁ jhānaṁ.
ps3.2:3.3: Iddhiyā imā catasso bhūmiyo iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya iddhivasībhāvāya iddhivesārajjāya saṁvattantīti.
ps3.2:4.2: Idha bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti, cittasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti, vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti, vīmaṁsāsamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṁ iddhipādaṁ bhāveti.
ps3.2:4.3: Iddhiyā ime cattāro pādā iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya iddhivasībhāvāya iddhivesārajjāya saṁvattantīti.
ps3.2:5.2: Chandañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṁ, labhati cittassa ekaggataṁ.
ps3.2:5.3: Chando na samādhi, samādhi na chando.
ps3.2:5.5: Vīriyañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṁ, labhati cittassa ekaggataṁ.
ps3.2:5.6: Vīriyaṁ na samādhi, samādhi na vīriyaṁ.
ps3.2:5.8: Cittañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṁ, labhati cittassa ekaggataṁ.
ps3.2:5.9: Cittaṁ na samādhi, samādhi na cittaṁ.
ps3.2:5.11: Vīmaṁsañce bhikkhu nissāya labhati samādhiṁ, labhati cittassa ekaggataṁ.
ps3.2:5.12: Vīmaṁsā na samādhi, samādhi na vīmaṁsā.
ps3.2:5.14: Iddhiyā imāni aṭṭha padāni iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya iddhivasībhāvāya iddhivesārajjāya saṁvattantīti.
ps3.2:6.12: Saddhāya pariggahitaṁ cittaṁ assaddhiye na iñjatīti—āneñjaṁ.
ps3.2:6.13: Vīriyena pariggahitaṁ cittaṁ kosajje na iñjatīti—āneñjaṁ.
ps3.2:6.14: Satiyā pariggahitaṁ cittaṁ pamāde na iñjatīti—āneñjaṁ.
ps3.2:6.15: Samādhinā pariggahitaṁ cittaṁ uddhacce na iñjatīti—āneñjaṁ.
ps3.2:6.16: Paññāya pariggahitaṁ cittaṁ avijjāya na iñjatīti—āneñjaṁ.
ps3.2:6.18: Iddhiyā imāni soḷasa mūlāni iddhilābhāya iddhipaṭilābhāya iddhivikubbanatāya iddhivisavitāya iddhivasībhāvāya iddhivesārajjāya saṁvattantīti.
ps3.2:7.3: ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti;
ps3.2:7.5: tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamāno gacchati, seyyathāpi ākāse;
ps3.2:7.8: ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo;
ps3.2:7.9: imepi candimasūriye evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasati parimajjati;
ps3.2:8.1: Idhāti imissā diṭṭhiyā imissā khantiyā imissā ruciyā imasmiṁ ādāye imasmiṁ dhamme imasmiṁ vinaye imasmiṁ dhammavinaye imasmiṁ pāvacane imasmiṁ brahmacariye imasmiṁ satthusāsane.
ps3.2:8.4: Bhikkhūti puthujjanakalyāṇako vā hoti bhikkhu sekho vā arahā vā akuppadhammo.
ps3.2:8.6: Ekopi hutvā bahudhā hotīti pakatiyā eko bahukaṁ āvajjati, sataṁ vā sahassaṁ vā satasahassaṁ vā āvajjati.
ps3.2:8.10: Yathāyasmā cūḷapanthako ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti, evamevaṁ so iddhimā cetovasippatto ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti.
ps3.2:8.11: Bahudhāpi hutvā eko hotīti pakatiyā bahuko ekaṁ āvajjati;
ps3.2:8.15: Yathāyasmā cūḷapanthako bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti, evamevaṁ so iddhimā cetovasippatto bahudhāpi hutvā eko hoti.
ps3.2:9.1: Āvibhāvanti kenaci anāvaṭaṁ hoti appaṭicchannaṁ vivaṭaṁ pākaṭaṁ.
ps3.2:9.2: Tirobhāvanti kenaci āvaṭaṁ hoti paṭicchannaṁ pihitaṁ paṭikujjitaṁ.
ps3.2:9.3: Tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamāno gacchati, seyyathāpi ākāseti pakatiyā ākāsakasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti.
ps3.2:9.9: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto kenaci anāvaṭe aparikkhitte asajjamānā gacchanti, evamevaṁ so iddhimā cetovasippatto tirokuṭṭaṁ tiropākāraṁ tiropabbataṁ asajjamāno gacchati, seyyathāpi ākāse.
ps3.2:10.1: Pathaviyāpi ummujjanimujjaṁ karoti, seyyathāpi udaketi pakatiyā āpokasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti.
ps3.2:10.7: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto udake ummujjanimujjaṁ karonti, evamevaṁ so iddhimā cetovasippatto pathaviyā ummujjanimujjaṁ karoti, seyyathāpi udake.
ps3.2:11.1: Udakepi abhijjamāne gacchati, seyyathāpi pathaviyanti pakatiyā pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti.
ps3.2:11.7: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto abhijjamānāya pathaviyā gacchanti, evamevaṁ so iddhimā cetovasippatto abhijjamāne udake gacchati, seyyathāpi pathaviyaṁ.
ps3.2:12.1: Ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamati, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇoti pakatiyā pathavīkasiṇasamāpattiyā lābhī hoti.
ps3.2:12.6: So ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti.
ps3.2:12.7: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto pathaviyā caṅkamantipi tiṭṭhantipi nisīdantipi seyyampi kappenti, evamevaṁ so iddhimā cetovasippatto ākāse antalikkhe caṅkamatipi tiṭṭhatipi nisīdatipi seyyampi kappeti, seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo.
ps3.2:13.1: Imepi candimasūriye evaṁmahiddhike evaṁmahānubhāve pāṇinā parāmasati parimajjatīti idha so iddhimā cetovasippatto nisinnako vā nipannako vā candimasūriye āvajjati.
ps3.2:13.5: So nisinnako vā nipannako vā candimasūriye pāṇinā āmasati parāmasati parimajjati.
ps3.2:13.6: Yathā manussā pakatiyā aniddhimanto kiñcideva rūpagataṁ hatthapāse āmasanti parāmasanti parimajjanti, evamevaṁ so iddhimā cetovasippatto nisinnako vā nipannako vā candimasūriye pāṇinā āmasati parāmasati parimajjati.
ps3.2:14.1: Yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṁ vattetīti sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto brahmalokaṁ gantukāmo hoti, dūrepi santike adhiṭṭhāti—
ps3.2:14.13: Dibbena cakkhunā tassa brahmuno rūpaṁ passati.
ps3.2:14.14: Dibbāya sotadhātuyā tassa brahmuno saddaṁ suṇāti.
ps3.2:14.16: Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gantukāmo hoti, kāyavasena cittaṁ pariṇāmeti, kāyavasena cittaṁ adhiṭṭhāti.
ps3.2:14.17: Kāyavasena cittaṁ pariṇāmetvā, kāyavasena cittaṁ adhiṭṭhahitvā, sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā dissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gacchati.
ps3.2:14.18: Sace so iddhimā cetovasippatto adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gantukāmo hoti, cittavasena kāyaṁ pariṇāmeti, cittavasena kāyaṁ adhiṭṭhāti.
ps3.2:14.19: Cittavasena kāyaṁ pariṇāmetvā, cittavasena kāyaṁ adhiṭṭhahitvā sukhasaññañca lahusaññañca okkamitvā adissamānena kāyena brahmalokaṁ gacchati.
ps3.2:14.20: So tassa brahmuno purato rūpiṁ abhinimmināti manomayaṁ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṁ ahīnindriyaṁ.
ps3.2:14.21: Sace so iddhimā caṅkamati, nimmitopi tattha caṅkamati.
ps3.2:14.22: Sace so iddhimā tiṭṭhati, nimmitopi tattha tiṭṭhati.
ps3.2:14.23: Sace so iddhimā nisīdati, nimmitopi tattha nisīdati.
ps3.2:14.24: Sace so iddhimā seyyaṁ kappeti, nimmitopi tattha seyyaṁ kappeti.
ps3.2:14.25: Sace so iddhimā dhūmāyati, nimmitopi tattha dhūmāyati.
ps3.2:14.26: Sace so iddhimā pajjalati, nimmitopi tattha pajjalati.
ps3.2:14.27: Sace so iddhimā dhammaṁ bhāsati, nimmitopi tattha dhammaṁ bhāsati.
ps3.2:14.28: Sace so iddhimā pañhaṁ pucchati, nimmitopi tattha pañhaṁ pucchati.
ps3.2:14.29: Sace so iddhimā pañhaṁ puṭṭho visajjeti, nimmitopi tattha pañhaṁ puṭṭho visajjeti.
ps3.2:14.30: Sace so iddhimā tena brahmunā saddhiṁ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṁ samāpajjati, nimmitopi tattha tena brahmunā saddhiṁ santiṭṭhati sallapati sākacchaṁ samāpajjati.
ps3.2:14.31: Yaññadeva so iddhimā karoti, taṁtadeva hi so nimmito karotīti—
ps3.2:15.2: Sikhissa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa abhibhū nāma sāvako brahmaloke ṭhito sahassilokadhātuṁ sarena viññāpesi.
ps3.2:15.5: dissamānenapi heṭṭhimena upaḍḍhakāyena adissamānenapi uparimena upaḍḍhakāyena dhammaṁ desesi.
ps3.2:15.6: Dissamānenapi uparimena upaḍḍhakāyena, adissamānenapi heṭṭhimena upaḍḍhakāyena dhammaṁ desesi.
ps3.2:15.7: So pakativaṇṇaṁ vijahitvā kumārakavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, nāgavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, supaṇṇavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, yakkhavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, indavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, devavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, brahmavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, samuddavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, pabbatavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, vanavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, sīhavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, byagghavaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, dīpivaṇṇaṁ vā dasseti, hatthimpi dasseti, assampi dasseti, rathampi dasseti, pattimpi dasseti, vividhampi senābyūhaṁ dassetīti—
ps3.2:16.2: Idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṁ kāyaṁ abhinimmināti rūpiṁ manomayaṁ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṁ ahīnindriyaṁ.
ps3.2:16.8: Seyyathā vā pana puriso asiṁ kosiyā pavāheyya.
ps3.2:16.13: Seyyathā vā pana puriso ahiṁ karaṇḍā uddhareyya.
ps3.2:16.18: Evamevaṁ bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṁ kāyaṁ abhinimmināti rūpiṁ manomayaṁ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṁ ahīnindriyaṁ.
ps3.2:17.11: Āyasmato bākulassa ñāṇavipphārā iddhi, āyasmato saṅkiccassa ñāṇavipphārā iddhi, āyasmato bhūtapālassa ñāṇavipphārā iddhi.
ps3.2:18.8: ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattiyā rūpasaññāya paṭighasaññāya nānattasaññāya pahānaṭṭho ijjhatīti …pe…
ps3.2:18.13: Āyasmato sāriputtassa samādhivipphārā iddhi, āyasmato sañjīvassa samādhivipphārā iddhi, āyasmato khāṇukoṇḍaññassa samādhivipphārā iddhi, uttarāya upāsikāya samādhivipphārā iddhi, sāmāvatiyā upāsikāya samādhivipphārā iddhi.
ps3.2:19.7: “paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan”ti, appaṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati.
ps3.2:19.9: “appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī vihareyyan”ti, paṭikūlasaññī tattha viharati.
ps3.2:19.11: “paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako vihareyyaṁ sato sampajāno”ti, upekkhako tattha viharati sato sampajāno.
ps3.2:20.2: Aniṭṭhasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ mettāya vā pharati, dhātuto vā upasaṁharati.
ps3.2:21.2: Iṭṭhasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ asubhāya vā pharati, aniccato vā upasaṁharati.
ps3.2:22.1: Kathaṁ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī viharati?
ps3.2:22.2: Aniṭṭhasmiñca iṭṭhasmiñca vatthusmiṁ mettāya vā pharati, dhātuto vā upasaṁharati.
ps3.2:22.3: Evaṁ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī viharati.
ps3.2:23.1: Kathaṁ appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī viharati?
ps3.2:23.2: Iṭṭhasmiñca aniṭṭhasmiñca vatthusmiṁ asubhāya vā pharati, aniccato vā upasaṁharati.
ps3.2:23.3: Evaṁ appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī viharati.
ps3.2:24.1: Kathaṁ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno?
ps3.2:24.2: Idha bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
ps3.2:24.7: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
ps3.2:24.8: Evaṁ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca tadubhayaṁ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno.
ps3.2:25.2: Sabbesaṁ pakkhīnaṁ, sabbesaṁ devānaṁ, ekaccānaṁ manussānaṁ, ekaccānaṁ vinipātikānaṁ.
ps3.2:26.2: Rājā cakkavattī vehāsaṁ gacchati saddhiṁ caturaṅginiyā senāya, antamaso assabandhagopurise upādāya.
ps3.2:26.3: Jotikassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi, jaṭilassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi, meṇḍakassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi, ghositassa gahapatissa puññavato iddhi, pañcannaṁ mahāpuññānaṁ puññavato iddhi.
ps3.2:27.2: Vijjādharā vijjaṁ parijappetvā vehāsaṁ gacchanti, ākāse antalikkhe hatthimpi dassenti, assampi dassenti, rathampi dassenti, pattimpi dassenti, vividhampi senābyūhaṁ dassenti.
ps3.2:28.8: Evaṁ tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi.
